categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic ranks

nodes.text: Transport chief was a role within the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Roving agents operating undercover, transport chiefs acquired needed supplies for the Alliance and then contracted independent spacers to transport the cargo to drop points and bases. Although they could not offer much in the way of credits up front, transport chiefs always ensured the spacer had other opportunities available once the cargo was transported, such as further cargo work, provisions, or even starship repairs. During the Galactic Civil War, Solla Kyler served as a transport chief for the Alliance.
